info.title: Company Product Quantity Manager
info.description: Manages product quantities in branches and in storages.

prop.name: dbc
prop.description: The Redback retail database connection manager.

method.name: set
method.description: Set the quantity for a product in the given storage unit.

parameter.name: $storageID
parameter.description: The storage id. It is optional and it is 1 by default. This should change in the next version because storage units must be created manually for every company.

method.returndescription: True on success, false on failure.

method.name: get
method.description: Get the quantity for the product in the current branch.

parameter.name: $includeStorage
parameter.description: If include storage, the array returned will have records for each storage in each branch. It is FALSE by default.

parameter.name: $storageID
parameter.description: It the includeStorage is set to TRUE, this will define the storage id to get quantity for, explicitly. Leave NULL for all storage units. It is NULL by default.

method.returndescription: An array of product quantity per branch or per storage, depending on the arguments.
